item.title: 日本取消公用事业补贴将推高通胀
item.description: 日本逐步取消公用事业补贴的计划可能会在夏季将通胀率推向 3%，这可能会使日本央行的加息思路复杂化。【原文：Japan’s plan to phase out utility subsidies is likely to push inflation toward 3% over the summer, potentially complicating the Bank of Japan’s thinking on the path of interest rate hikes.】

item.title: 韩国银行股在改革押注下将创 2017 年以来最佳季度表现
item.description: 由于投资者对政府的企业改革承诺充满信心，韩国银行股将迎来六年多来表现最好的一个季度。【原文：Bank stocks in South Korea are headed for their best quarter in more than six years as investors put faith in the government’s corporate reform pledges.】

item.title: 美国股市上涨后，亚洲股市将高开：市场综述
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市有望高开，因为市场猜测美联储将实现经济软着陆，美股在本季度表现亮眼。【原文：Equity markets in Asia look set to open higher Friday after a stellar quarter for US stocks ended on a positive note amid speculation the Federal Reserve will be able to achieve a soft landing.】

item.title: 埃克森公司和中国石油天然气股份有限公司合并圭亚那对雪佛龙公司的仲裁请求
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. and Cnooc Ltd. merged arbitration claims against Chevron Corp.’s proposed takeover of Hess Corp. that would allow the US oil supermajor to enter Guyana’s Stabroek Block.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "备忘录股 "在飙升，但还能持续多久？
item.description: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普比以往任何时候都更富有，而这一切都要归功于他将最新投资项目上市的幕后交易。【原文：Former president Donald Trump is richer than he’s ever been, and it’s all thanks to a back-door deal to take his latest venture public.】

item.title: 美联储中央银行工具中的现金在日元干预言论中增加
item.description: 美联储为外国央行提供的一项关键贷款机制的使用率上升，因为日本官员本周加大了警告力度，称他们将采取行动阻止日元下滑。【原文：Usage of a key Federal Reserve facility for foreign central banks rose as Japanese officials this week stepped up warnings they would act to halt the slide in the yen.】

item.title: 智利在铜产量连年下降之后看到了 Codelco 的复兴
item.description: 据智利政府一位高级官员称，在生产低迷和项目超支侵蚀了这家国有铜业巨头的财政之后，Codelco 公司正在转危为安。【原文：Codelco is turning the corner after a production slump and project overruns eroded the state-owned copper behemoth’s finances, according to a top Chilean government official.】

item.title: 华尔街人心惶惶，动量交易结束历史性一季
item.description: 华尔街最简单的股票策略，深受金融界最聪明人的喜爱，刚刚结束了二十多年来业绩最好的一个季度。【原文：The simplest stock strategy on Wall Street — beloved by the smartest minds in finance and more — just closed out its best quarter in more than two decades.】

item.title: Blackwells 在代理权争夺战中就与 ValueAct 的关系起诉迪士尼
item.description: Blackwells Capital LLC 要求特拉华州法官强迫华特迪士尼公司交出有关其与激进投资者 ValueAct Capital Management 关系的记录，以及该公司在这场娱乐巨头董事会构成之争中扮演的角色。【原文：Blackwells Capital LLC asked a Delaware judge to force Walt Disney Co. to hand over records about its relationship with activist investor ValueAct Capital Management and the role it played in a fight over the makeup of the entertainment giant’s board of directors.】

item.title: Blackstone 向 Rexford 出售价值 10 亿美元的加州仓库
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 以 10 亿美元的价格将南加州的 48 座仓库出售给 Rexford Industrial Realty Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc. sold 48 warehouses in Southern California to Rexford Industrial Realty Inc. for $1 billion.】

item.title: 美国货币市场基金连续两周资金外流
item.description: 货币市场基金资产连续第二周下降，主要原因是机构政府基金在最近的季度企业缴税活动中下跌。【原文：Money-market fund assets fell for the second straight week, driven by institutional government funds, amid the recent quarterly corporate tax payment.】

item.title: 巴尔的摩大桥垮塌令纸浆市场雪上加霜
item.description: 巴尔的摩一座主要桥梁的垮塌造成了纸浆流入美国的中断，这是卫生纸主要成分的一些最大出口国最近遇到的头疼问题。【原文：The collapse of a major Baltimore bridge is creating disruptions in the flow of pulp into the US, in the latest headache for some of the largest exporters of the key ingredient in toilet paper.】

item.title: 花旗集团北美技术 ECM 联席主管费奇已离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，花旗集团北美技术与通信股权资本市场联席主管格雷戈尔-费奇（Gregor Feige）已经离职，另谋高就。【原文：Citigroup Inc.’s North America co-head of technology and communications equity capital markets Gregor Feige has left the bank to pursue another opportunity, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 零售商 99 美分正在酝酿潜在的破产申请
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，99 Cents Only Store LLC 正在考虑申请破产，因为这家折扣零售商面临着流动资金短缺的问题。【原文：99 Cents Only Store LLC is considering a bankruptcy filing as the discount retailer faces a liquidity shortfall, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦指出过晚降息的经济风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）认为，欧洲中央银行不能忽视长期维持高利率所带来的经济风险，应该在接下来的两次会议中的一次会议上开始降息。【原文：The European Central Bank can’t ignore the economic risks of keeping interest rates high for too long and should begin cutting at one of its next two meetings, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 美国企业借贷热潮掀起有史以来最繁忙的第一季度
item.description: 在美联储开始降息之前，投资者对高收益的追捧使美国投资级公司债券一级市场创下了有史以来最繁忙的第一季度。【原文：The primary US investment-grade corporate bond market logged its busiest first quarter on record, super-charged by investors clamoring for high yields before the Federal Reserve starts cutting interest rates.】

item.title: Nuveen 与 Invitation 达成租房管理协议
item.description: Nuveen 将把约 3,000 栋出租房屋的管理权移交给 Invitation Homes Inc.【原文：Nuveen is shifting management of about 3,000 rental houses to Invitation Homes Inc., marking the end of its attempt to launch a new single-family landlord.】

item.title: 了解美国食品系统的市场集中度
item.description:
少数几家公司是如何主宰我们的饮食的？【原文：

How a handful of companies dominate the foods that we eat.

】

item.title: 甲骨文公司因投标面临被南非政府列入黑名单的风险
item.description: 南非为打击腐败和滥用公共资金而成立的特别调查组要求国家财政部禁止甲骨文公司与政府开展业务，因为该调查组认为甲骨文公司的招标存在缺陷。【原文：South Africa’s Special Investigation Unit, established to tackle corruption and the misuse of public funds, asked the National Treasury to bar Oracle Corp. from doing business with the government because of what it says was a flawed tender.】

item.title: 卢拉推动经济增长，巴西寻求促进房地产市场发展
item.description: 在巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）要求促进经济增长的压力下，巴西正准备采取措施促进本国房地产市场的发展。【原文：Brazil is readying measures to boost the country’s real estate market amid pressure from President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva to fuel economic growth.】

item.title: 拜耳支持的 Boundless Bio 在 1 亿美元首次公开募股后下跌 9
item.description: 拜耳公司（Bayer AG）是一家癌症治疗药生产商，其最大的投资者之一是拜耳公司，该公司在美国首次公开募股募集到 1 亿美元后，股价下跌了 9%。【原文：Shares of Boundless Bio Inc., a cancer therapeutics maker that counts Bayer AG among its largest investors, fell 9% after raising $100 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 巴西希望利用 Eletrobras 资金降低电费
item.description: 据一位熟悉该计划的官员透露，路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦总统打算在下周颁布一项临时措施，旨在通过将巴西最大的发电公司所欠电费证券化来降低巴西的电价。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva intends to issue a provisional measure next week designed to lower Brazil’s electricity prices through the securitization of payments owed by the country’s largest power generation company, according to an official familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 巴拿马信用评级在矿难中被惠誉下调至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）取消了巴拿马的投资级信用评级，原因是巴拿马去年关闭了一个重要的铜矿，加剧了该国的财政忧虑，并有可能破坏经济增长前景。【原文：Fitch Ratings stripped Panama of its investment-grade credit rating as the closure of a key copper mine last year adds to the country’s fiscal worries and risks undermining growth prospects.】

item.title: 运营商称德国煤电厂保持待机成本过高
item.description: 德国一家煤电厂运营商警告说，按照国家监管机构的要求，让发电站处于待机状态以帮助维持未来几年的电力供应是无利可图的。【原文：A coal plant operator in Germany has warned that it’s unprofitable to put power stations on standby to help keep the lights on for the next few years, as requested by the nation’s regulator.】

item.title: 万科下滑，碧桂园停工，中国房地产困境加剧
item.description: 中国最大的房地产公司之一推迟发布财报，另一家公司则公布了创纪录的利润下滑，因为中国的房地产危机没有缓解的迹象。【原文：One of China’s biggest property firms delayed its earnings report while another posted a record profit decline as the nation’s real estate crisis shows no signs of easing.】

item.title: 奇才和首都体育馆交易因 12 亿美元的小额贷款出售而得以缓解
item.description: 去年的再融资降低了华盛顿特区的利息支出，使其有能力为国家篮球协会的奇才队和国家冰球联盟的首都队提供超过 5 亿美元的新场馆。【原文：Washington, D.C.’s ability to offer the National Basketball Association’s Wizards and the National Hockey League’s Capitals more than $500 million for a new arena was eased by a refinancing last year that cut its interest bills.】

item.title: 月度意外盈余后南非兰特减少损失
item.description: 兰特扭转了早些时候的跌势，因为数据显示政府 2 月份意外录得预算盈余，这是自 7 月份以来的第二次盈余。【原文：The rand reversed earlier losses after data showed the government unexpectedly recorded a budget surplus in February, only the second positive reading since July.】

item.title: 穆迪下调评级后，S&P 下调法国 Altice 公司评级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司下调了Altice France SA的信用评级，进一步增加了持有该债务的抵押贷款义务的压力。【原文：S&P Global Ratings lowered Altice France SA’s credit rating, adding further pressure on the collateralized loan obligations holding the debt.】

item.title: 法国电力集团与核燃料生产商谈判，希望绕过俄罗斯
item.description: 法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）正在与奥拉诺公司（Orano SA）和西屋电气公司（Westinghouse Electric Co.【原文：Electricite de France SA is in talks with Orano SA and Westinghouse Electric Co. over the construction of a nuclear facility in Western Europe that would help the company to bypass Russia for supplies of reprocessed fuel used in France’s power stations.】

item.title: Grindr 首次获得买入评级，Cowen 认为其增长速度超过 Tinder 所有者
item.description: 华尔街首家将 Grindr Inc. 评为 "买入 "股票的公司称，Grindr Inc. 专注于 LGBTQ+ 社区，其收入增长有望快于约会应用行业巨头 Match Group Inc.【原文：Grindr Inc.’s focus on the LGBTQ+ community promises faster revenue growth than the dating app industry titans, Match Group Inc. and Bumble Inc., according to the first Wall Street firm to rate the stock a buy.】
